text: Mark Yeager is an American biologist, focusing in cardiac gap junction membrane channels, integrin water channels, rotavirus, reovirus and retrovirus. Yeager is a professor at University of Virginia and an Elected Fellow of American Association for the Advancement of Science. ==Education== *Mphil, Yale University *BS, Carnegie Mellon University *PhD, Yale University *MD, Yale School of MedicineUVA bio ==References== Category:Fellows of the American Association for the Advancement of Science Category:21st-century American biologists Category:Carnegie Mellon University alumni Category:Yale School of Medicine alumni Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people
title: Mark Yeager
